Method Detail

isNullOrEmpty

public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(java.lang.String str)
Inspect a String for content. Note that this method considers white space as content and therefore a non-empty String.

Parameters:
str - to inspect.
Returns:
true if the String is not null and has zero length.

requireNonEmpty

public static java.lang.String requireNonEmpty(java.lang.String value,
                                               java.lang.String name)
Inspect a String for content, throws NullPointerException if is null or empty.

Parameters:
value - to inspect.
name - of String to report in exception.
Returns:
the inspected value.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - detailing name of String that is either null or empty.

join

public static java.lang.String join(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> strings,
                                    java.lang.String join)
Joins strings using the specified join String.

Parameters:
strings - to join.
join - the string to join strings with.
Returns:
single String representing joined strings.

trimLeading

public static java.lang.String trimLeading(java.lang.String str,
                                           char t)
Trims leading characters from a String.

Parameters:
str - to trim.
t - character to trim.
Returns:
str with all leading characters t removed.
